title: Devils Comfort MC
description: This is a short introduction to Devils Comfort MC series which is coming soonThey are tough alpha men, who love to ride their bikes on the open roads of Louisiana and when they are not riding, they are partying hard,They rule Comfort Spring, a small town located near The Mississippi River.Meet them here before they tell you their stories on how their lives are changed when they meet and fall hard for five Strong willed women, who don’t take no bullshit from their men.There is no real story to this book, as it is mainly an introduction to the characters of the Brothers of Devil Comfort MC, however there are wee teasers and tasters on what to expect from this seriesThis book contains explicit sex and is intended for mature audience of 18+ onlyThere are acts of female on female action, ménage, self pleasure, anal play (male and female), strong language BDSM child physical abuse, Arrogant Dominant Alpha Men If this offends you please do not purchase
author: Brair Lake
